verses.roman:
śālvaḥ pratijñām akaroc
chṛṇvatāṁ sarva-bhūbhujām
ayādavāṁ kṣmāṁ kariṣye
pauruṣaṁ mama paśyata

synonyms: śālvaḥ—Śālva; pratijñām—a promise; akarot—made; śṛṇvatām—as they listened; sarva—all; bhū-bhujām—the kings; ayādavām—devoid of Yādavas; kṣmām—the earth; kariṣye—I will make; pauruṣam—prowess; mama—my; paśyata—just see.
translation: Śālva swore in the presence of all the kings: "I will rid the earth of Yādavas. Just see my prowess!"
